title: Everything She Wants
summary: Somebody told me "Boy, everything she wants is everything she sees". I guess I must have loved you Because I said you were the perfect girl for me! Baby, and now we're six months older and everything you want, and everything you see; Is out of reach, not good enough. I don't know what the hell you want from me, oh

title: Random Sentence
summary: The river stole the gods. Yeah, I think it's a good environment for learning English. There were a lot of paintings of monkeys waving bamboo sticks in the gallery.
